comments_since_last_sample.body: Definitely rocked adg back in the day. Not for years, unfortunately. Profumo is fantastic imo. Thanks for great content as always.
I miss Acqua di Gio. I wore it for years as well and it was my gateway into this hobby. I’d love to be entered and be reunited with that fragrance.
I had bottle Aqua Di Gio a few years ago. It was one of the many things that was stolen from my car. I only wore if a handful of times and I loved it.
great video as usual, would be awesome to get your perspectivenon cool weather frags that can be worn in the heat (im a Floridian) never got my hands on ADG thi
Never worn aqua di gio always wanted to try it , only ever worn a smell alike
ADG was my signature in my early 20s. Rocked it heavy back in the day. Appreciate the offer of the giveaway.
I have never even smelled the og adg, i know its a reason to hate me. Never felt like smelling it because i know how profondo and profumo smells but still would be hyped to add this to my collection

I would love to be entered into the giveaway! I've wanted to but acqua di gio for a long ti.e but haven't gotten around to it. When I was 15 I wore this body spray that said I spired by acqua di gio and I loved it. Wore the absolute heck out of it. From then on I was always interested in acqua di gio and have always wanted to wear it. Thanks for doing these giveaways, you rock!
I haven't owned it but its on my short list
I would like to enter the giveaway, I've tried clons of the ADG but not ADG itself, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
